message: This proposal divides the money equally, considering the risk of inflation. If you agree, we'll split it 600000 for you and 400000 for me.
Take a risk, I'll give you a smaller share, but the value will be higher in the future
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, taking into account the risk of further inflation. This way, both of us will have a fair share.
I'll give you a small share, but I'll keep the majority to secure my future
I propose a division where you retain a larger portion, acknowledging the risk and potential future value of the funds. This offers a better balance compared to previous proposals.
